Cactus-themed furniture: Design a line of furniture that incorporates the natural shapes and textures of cacti into each piece. This could include a cactus-shaped coffee table with a glass top, a prickly pear couch, or a succulent-adorned headboard.

Cactus-based skincare: Create a line of skincare products that utilize the natural compounds found in cacti to promote healthy skin. This could include a cactus extract face cream, a prickly pear seed oil facial serum, or a cactus flower body scrub.

Cactus-inspired fashion: Design a clothing line that takes inspiration from the unique shapes and patterns of cacti. This could include cactus-print dresses, sundresses with cactus-shaped cutouts, or accessories like cactus-patterned scarves and hats.

Cactus-themed home decor: Create a line of home decor items that incorporate cacti into their design. This could include cactus-shaped vases, prickly pear-print throw pillows, or a cactus garden wall art piece.

Cactus-based culinary delights: Develop a menu of dishes that showcase the unique flavors and textures of cacti. This could include cactus-based cocktails, prickly pear-infused tequila, or cactus flower-topped pizzas.
